Plot: A troubled actor, a television show runner, and an acclaimed videogame designer find their lives intertwining in mysterious and unsettling ways.
Title: The Nines
Actors: Ryan Reynolds, Melissa McCarthy, Hope Davis, Elle Fanning
tomatoConsensus: Though The Nines doesn't solidify as well as writer/director John August would hope for, Ryan Reynolds's strong performance makes each of the film's intriguing segments worth watching.
